title: Can't comment or create discussions on this account
body: Says I have to be Level 5 then says higher levels to post on the board. However, this is a Level 30. What is up with these boards?

replies.body: Your Boards profile has to Sync with your Summoner profile to know what level you are. Sometimes it takes a post like this one to cause a manual sync to level you up. It looks like that's exactly what happened, so you're set! ^.^
